html:
9.18.19  4:25 am   I think that everything causally interacts with everything from the order of Big Bang to the disorder of Big Freeze and every creature of the universe is only an instrument for increasing the total entropy by decreasing their own entropy. So what is our meaning?

      see how many different meanings there can be

9.18.19  2:49 am   Do you answer serious questions on this site with serious answers?

      yes

9.18.19  2:44 am   how do i stop being bored

      you could try being struck by lightning

9.18.19  1:30 am   how did you get many keyboards working with your keyboard maestro, keyboard maestro

      step 1, use Karabiner, but instead of swapping keys, disable all the keys (set every key to vk disable). that will be like 100 items to add and 2 pop-up menus each, so i recommend using kbm for assistance to get through it. disable the keys on every extra keyboard (not your main keyboard) then, in keyboard maestro, when you add a trigger, instead of using "HotKey" trigger (that would be for your regular keyboard) use "USB device key". it should come right up. as long as the keyboards aren't the exact same model, they will be recognized as different. Actually, i'm pretty sure that they will all be recognized as different no matter what. i've never actually tried to use 2 that are the identically exact same model so i'm not sure, but i'm pretty sure it would be fine. then, one slight problem you may run into, next time you restart your computer, if the keyboards don't work when you restart, just sleep the computer real quick and wake it up. then they should work. another side warning, if you do get this working, watch out for the binge-buying of keyboards that may occur as a result

9.18.19  12:23 am   If you know something will fail, is it still worth it to see it through?

      you could add it to a fails compilation

9.18.19  12:18 am   Why do you answer the questions? Do you get anything from these?

      iT ExOrCiSeS mY InTerPersoNaL cOMmuNicATiOn tAcTiCs

9.18.19  12:04 am   How long does it take you to make a video like Airport Terminal?

      everything's different now but that one took about 2 weeks

9.18.19  12:01 am   What would you do with $4.00?

      try to invent the 4 dollar bill

9.17.19  11:59 pm   What is the meaning of your videos?

      they are a celebration of video making

9.17.19  11:36 pm   how many keyboards do you have now??

     3 and a half but i just ordered 2 and a half more

      do they all fit on your desk??

      yes

9.17.19  10:52 pm   oh no i think i'm shy

      you might enjoy public speaking

9.17.19  10:09 pm   discuss the differences between soap and soup.

      soup is the brown one

9.17.19  9:59 pm   sometimes i light candles :)

      oh that's classic

9.17.19  9:58 pm   opinion on wind up toys?

      it's fun if you hack them and remove the stopper so you can wind them up even farther

9.17.19  9:57 pm   When will you release another video?

      what the heck is a video

9.17.19  9:54 pm   How much work is too much work?

      maybe 100 or 200 work

9.17.19  9:51 pm   how do you meet someone without greeting them

      it just depends on whether you have established proper boundaries

9.17.19  9:49 pm   is the mall still closed because of you

      it turns out they are building a much better mall. that was their plan all along. i must admit i was wrongsighted in assuming it was because of me

9.17.19  9:37 pm   is there a certain time you want to finish your video by? (if you are making one)

      would be nice to finish them several times a week. that would be ideal

9.17.19  9:18 pm   what is your opinion on tropical penguins? 

      i believe you

9.17.19  8:56 pm   how do you make all your songs sound like the same song but somehow different and make it also sound good!!!!

      i actually try to make them sound different, but sometimes the similarities can be a side effect of me being the same person as myself

9.17.19  8:53 pm   Do you ever wish people would stop asking so many questions so that you could focus on doing whatever your doing

      there's always more questions than i answer, so it doesn't entirely matter how many questions people ask

9.17.19  8:47 pm   Do you ever want to completely change up your entire identity and switch to some other form of passion-

     sure

      does the pressure of people liking your former art prevent you from doing this?

     absolutely not, if anything that sometimes makes me want to change more

      Were you "inpired" by something to do 3D?

     mostly the spacial universe as we know it

9.17.19  8:47 pm   If you don't solve my problems, why do I ask you questions

      because maybe there's still a chance i might solve them

9.17.19  8:42 pm   sometimes i find it hard to find the points and meanings in life. I don't not wanna have life, i love it, but i cant find the reason... Is that the reason? Or is there another reason?

      it will be difficult for me to illustrate this properly, but the abscence of life is pretty boring

9.17.19  8:36 pm   can you tell me what things are made of things put together with other things are made of?

      goup

9.17.19  8:35 pm   School has really been getting on my last nerve lately. Any ideas on how I can make it not on my last nerve

      draw pictures of it

9.17.19  8:10 pm   What's your opinion on mac and cheese?

      it seems to be a very confident color

9.17.19  8:02 pm   do you use a font maker for any reason?

      no but i should

9.17.19  7:31 pm   i've remapped some of my keyboard buttons to suit my needs better (i.e. caps lock -> end) but the problem is when i type on someone else's keyboard things don't work as i expect. what's your strategy for this situation

      panic. if you are wondering where the panic button is, it's any button that does not do what you expect. so in this case it would be caps lock

9.17.19  7:18 pm   Is the cake a lie

      it's not only a lie, but it is also a fib

      everyone is teacher

      no question is random. they are all in strict accordance with logic, and reason

      no need to change the time signature unless you come up with an idea that requires a change in time signature

      yes, and write
